p: Local or systemic steroids can significantly reduce the mass and control the lesions, lymphadenopathy and nephrotic syndrome ( 17). Oral prednisolone has a high degree of individualization, and administered in different doses, durations and gradual reduction schemes according to the size of the primary or recurrent lesions ( 18â€“ 20). Even so, the mass also has recurrence after glucocorticoid reduction (about 45.8%) ( 21).
